name: Rise Up (itch)
description:
Grab your videocamera, break into the compound, rescue the downtrodden and expose the authoritarian oppressors....

RISE UP is an arcade style game created for #ResistJam where players must navigate the playfield to rescue all the downtrodden while avoiding the oppressors out to stop you.

  • F1 - Toggle Full Screen Mode
  • MOUSE - Navigate Menus, LEFT CLICK to interact in Menus
  • WASD - Control Player (W: Up, A: Left, S: Down, D: Right)

Rescue all the Downtrodden to Win.

Thank you for playing and all the best to all the other #ResistJam entries!!!

Note: Music in the game is by OZZED and used under Creative Commons.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Known Issues:

  • There are some sprite overlapping issues occasionally with the player and the enemy
  • When dying and restarting to try again, the "Downtrodden" score will shift to where the word is mostly off-screen but you can still see the score counter.

Hopefully will have the time to get these fixed sometime down the road. Till then the game is fully playable from beginning to end. Thanks again for checking it out!
